artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Woman in white gown with purple overgown, green gloves, a walking stick, and a yellow hat with coral ribbon and plumes; this individual plate is a duplicate of the plate found in the bound fashion periodical of the same name P.15,240-P.15,242
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate II from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Trente-sixième & Dernier Cahier, 10 Novembre 1787
